name: Second Hand Stores, Used Merchandise Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell used merchandise or secondhand goods.
Products for sale may include accessories, shoes and clothing,
furniture, books, bicycles, musical instruments, sewing machines,
electronic equipment, appliances, and other household items.
Typically, the items for sale have been donated or are on
consignment. Such merchants may or may not also sell antiques.
For the merchants that primarily sell antiques, use MCC 5932.
For pawnshops, use MCC 5933.
